body_html: You should be able to just feed whatever you want to D during testing (and presumably since you don't need the gradient during testing, you're not fetching anything below D either). Doing so will induce a subgraph that cuts out everything before it.
body_text: You should be able to just feed whatever you want to D during testing (and presumably since you don't need the gradient during testing, you're not fetching anything below D either).  Doing so will induce a subgraph that cuts out everything before it.
body: You should be able to just feed whatever you want to D during testing (and presumably since you don't need the gradient during testing, you're not fetching anything below D either).  Doing so will induce a subgraph that cuts out everything before it.
